post:
We are here to offer you a great deal on our high quality VPS servers. We give you friendly, personal customer support. We try to know you by name. Whatever it is, we will do
our best to satisfy your needs.

We own all of our servers and other equipment. We are hosted in Durham, NC in one of Tierpont's many tier III data centers.

24/7 monitoring system, 24/7 Support

Feel free to ask any questions here or email us at Sales@LittleCreekHosting.com

All virtual machines come with the below:

  • 1 IPv4 addresses
  • No setup fees
  • Free reinstalls
  • 99.99% uptime SLA
  • 24/7 on-site technical support
  • Full remote management and control (VNC access, reboot, reinstall, bandwidth check, etc.)
  • No long-term contract. Monthly payment and you can cancel at any time.
  • Payments by credit/debit cards, Paypal
  • Free DirectAdmin (Please select it when purchasing)

These prices are not advertised anywhere on our web site. These deals have been especially created for the Hosting Discussion website. They can only be accessed from the links below.

Why choose Little Creek Hosting?

  • We have over 14 years of experience in the hosting industry
  • Free full migration assistance
  • Always improving our services based on customers feedback
  • 30 day money back guarantee
  • We own all our hardware and equipment
  • 24/7 on-site support
  • HW RAID-10 Supermicro servers
  • 99.99% network uptime
  • Professional and super fast support
  • Motivated and friendly staff
  • Pay online and start using immediately

All VPS’s include the following:

  • Virtualizor Control Panel
  • Unlimited Domains

  • Free DirectAdmin Control Panel if selected
